product_name: Maui Jim Kanani Polarized Sunglasses - Women's
long_description: A fashion-forward addition to the Maui Jim family, the Kanani polarized sunglasses offer premium protection and vibrant, colorful views when you're running errands or basking in paradise. Polarized lenses reduce 99% of visible glare from water, snow, sand and pavement for increased visual acuity and decreased eye strain. PolarizedPlus(R)2 lenses block glare and UV from all angles while managing harmful blue light and boosting colors for clarity and contrast. Twilight Fade frames feature neutral grey lenses, ideal for bright, direct sunlight days. Grey Tortoise frames feature Maui Rose(R) lenses for everyday variable conditions; they offer the highest contrast available from Maui Jim. SuperThin glass lenses are 20% thinner than conventional laminated polarized lenses and have crystal clear optics and scratch resistance. Impact-resistant, lightweight nylon frames offer consistent fit and flexibility at any temperature. Anti-corrosive nickel/silver alloy spring hinges enhance durability. Built-in rubber nose pads prevent slippage. Maui Jim Kanani polarized sunglasses include a protective case and cleaning cloth.
short_description: A fashion-forward addition to the Maui Jim family, the Kanani polarized sunglasses offer premium protection and vibrant, colorful views when you're running errands or basking in paradise.
